channel.title: Dr. Pepperscape (made by Dr. Pepper)
channel.description:
I DID NOT CREATE THIS SOURCE, DR. PEPPER AND SUNKIST DID, I AM NOT TAKING CREDIT FOR ANY OF THIS EXCEPT FOR A FEW VERY MINOR EDITS.
I just had this on my computer and I noticed it wasn't on the forums. I don't think Dr. Pepper even has this anymore. I don't know if Dr. Pepper cares if I post this but it originally had a download link on Dr. Pepperscape forums until someone deleted it (nima304). Anyways here it is. I only made very minor edits to it. Also thanks to Sunkist here's the original source too before any edits.
Original Source-http://uppit.com/v/X1961WBD
Source with a few edits-http://uppit.com/v/PMAY2NIN
[img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/2525/evolved0223.png[/img] [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/2989/evolved0224.png[/img] [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/8715/evolved0225.png[/img] [img]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/6685/evolved0226.png[/img] [img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/8599/evolved0227.png[/img] [img]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/875/evolved0228.png[/img] [img]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/372/evolved0229.png[/img] [img]http://img38.imageshack.us/img38/2026/evolved0230.png[/img] [img]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/6884/evolved0231.png[/img] [img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/4522/evolved0232.png[/img] [img]http://img512.imageshack.us/img512/7353/evolved0234.png[/img]

item.title: Dr. Pepperscape (made by Dr. Pepper)
item.dc:creator: @_Sunkist _Sunkist_
item.description:
@_Sunkist wrote:

We only really used Silab Client.

The client we released still had a bunch of nulls, so was never really used.

Read full topic

item.title: Dr. Pepperscape (made by Dr. Pepper)
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

Okay, I tested out the source. And I was using Sk1ttlezrule43v client. And silab. The staffzone shop has nulls, (most) and there are 9 nulls in the shops that I want to fix, but they are customs. Can you give me a download link to the client you used? I am using the one you tweeked up. (:

Read full topic

item.title: Dr. Pepperscape (made by Dr. Pepper)
item.dc:creator: @_Sunkist _Sunkist_
item.description:
@_Sunkist wrote:

…

How was my post advertising in anyway?

They asked me to show pictures of proof that I had helped make the source So I posted pictures of when we used to run it…

Our server hasn’t been online for well over a year.

EDIT: Nvm, saw your message. But I still don’t entirely agree with your punishment. :rolleyes:

EDIT: Thank you.

Read full topic

[quote=“Dr Pepper2, post:21, topic:286847”]Ok, lets get this story over with. I’m Dr Pepper, I don’t know my old password, how would you like me to prove it, and when I give him permission to post this.

And everything Sunkist has said is true.[/quote]

You need to confirm this with me, or you’ll be banned.

item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

jasonator94:

Diluted the picture I posted was proof that Nima got on drpepper’s account on his old forums.

I know, I talked to Dr Pepper about it, but just think. If someone posted your source, without your permission, what would you do. All I was trying to figure out.

item.description:
@Dr_Pepper21 wrote:

item.title: Dr. Pepperscape (made by Dr. Pepper)
item.dc:creator: @gangstaboy_D gangstaboy:D
item.description:
@gangstaboy_D wrote:

[quote=“xxDiluted2xx, post:1, topic:287206”][quote author=gangstaboy:D link=topic=379356.msg2855424#msg2855424 date=1246819899]
trogan found
[/quote]

That’s weird, I downloaded it, and I have nothing? And all you did was post pictures. And a forum link. I need proof. But yeah, I played the original server to. When him and dark-death scape or something were going at it. I used to stay up until like 7 in the morning trying to get 100 cmb and pking with my full skeletal and daisies. :D[/quote]
there u go…the virus pic…

item.title: Dr. Pepperscape (made by Dr. Pepper)
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

[quote=“r34p4g3pk, post:28, topic:286847”][quote author=xxDiluted2xx link=topic=379356.msg2856026#msg2856026 date=1246856667]

Umm Diluted just so you know. I think that Nima304 also has the password to Dr Pepper’s account on his forum because he posted an advertisement for the Nimascape project a while back and check Dr. Pepper’s profile. It has Nima’s email in it. Also stuff like “Post to receive a free ban” is shit that nima says. That’s what he told me when he banned me from his forums. Also check the news at the top, yet another link to nima’s forums.

Lol it’s just a source. No need for the drama.

Also here’s proof
http://img39.imageshack.us/i/nima.jpg/

Honestly, in that picture, I don’t see anything that says you have permission.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2009, 11:04:50 pm[/size][hr][quote author=Dr Pepper2 link=topic=379356.msg2856025#msg2856025 date=1246856650]
Ok, lets get this story over with. I’m Dr Pepper, I don’t know my old password, how would you like me to prove it, and when I give him permission to post this.
[/quote]

Nice try noob, you’re a first poster, registered like 5 minutes ago. Epic fail.
[/quote]This whole entire thread after the first post is an epic fail.[/quote]

Gtfo the topic, didn’t involve you, so don’t call people fails.

Read full topic
